protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturerâ€™s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MTAB-4222
text: Total RNAs were extracted by using Trizol Reagent.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-4223
text: Arabidopsis seeds were germinated and grown under light condition for 7 days.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-4224
protocol.text: Arabidopsis seeds were germinated and grown under complete darkness for 7 days.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-4225
protocol.text: Seedlings grown in the same plate were pooled.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-4226
protocol.text: Seedlings grown in the same plate were pooled.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-4227
text: Arabidopsis seedlings were grown under complete darkness.
(Parameters: start time = 7, time unit = days, min temperature = 22, temperature unit = C, media = MS media)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-4228
text: Total RNAs were extracted by using Trizol Reagent.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-4229
text: Arabidopsis seedlings were grown under light condition.
(Parameters: start time = 7, time unit = days, min temperature = 22, temperature unit = C, media = MS media)

protocol.name: LC Sciences - Scanning Protocol
text: Fluorescence images were collected by the manufacturer (LC Sciences) using a laser scanner (GenePix 4000B, Molecular Device) and digitized using Array-Pro image analysis software (Media Cybernetics).
(Parameters: Scanning hardware = GenePix 4000B [Axon Instruments], Scanning software = GenePix Pro [Axon Instruments])
